EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Strategy Workshop_DC_Q217.Strategy Workshop Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Cloud-Native Strategy Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Strategy Workshop wit.
Date: DAY, Month xx, 2017
Time:
X:xxAM to Y:yyPM
Location: Pivotal DC 1625 I St NW, Suite 601 Washington, DC, 20006 (map <[[https://pivotal.io/locations/washington-dc]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team See Agenda
